body.name: Men's Sport Coats Blazers Slim Fit Jacket for Men One Button Sport Coat for Wedding
features: Premium Material --- High-performance soft fabric skin-friendly, the slim fit blazer features a mid-weight fabric for all-season wear. Dry Clean Only(Recommended).

【Professional Design】Lightweight sports coat designed in slim fit,featuring with notched laple,one button closure, left chest real pocket, two flap real pockets and one interior real pocket in lining; Professional tailoring offers you a sharper looking.

【Casual & Classy】You can marry this casual sport jackets with blue skinny jeans for a casual yet seriously stylish look; Or team this trendy blazer jacket with white shirt 、suit vest and dress pants for a sharp, fashionable look. Great gift for Dad, Hubby, Son, Friends.

【Occasions】This stylish jackt is essential in mens wardrobe and greats for all season; Suitable for casual, business casual, club, office, meeting , dinner, party, dates, wedding, graduation party, prom, presentation, banquet, show, dancing, festival event.
Normal dry-clean. The front pockets are closed by stitches. So after cutting stitches, you can use them,Regular fit blazer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Stylish Choice for Formal Occasions
reviews.reviewText: The Men's Sport Coats Blazers Slim Fit Jacket has pleasantly surprised me with its modern design and versatility, particularly as a one-button sport coat suitable for weddings and formal events.Pros:Modern Slim Fit: The slim fit of this sport coat is a standout feature, providing a contemporary and tailored look. It complements the body shape without being overly restrictive, offering a stylish silhouette that is well-suited for formal occasions.Versatile One-Button Design: The one-button design adds a touch of sophistication to the sport coat. It strikes a balance between a classic and modern aesthetic, making it suitable for various formal events, including weddings. The streamlined look enhances the overall appearance.Quality Construction: The construction of the sport coat is commendable, with attention to detail evident in the stitching and overall craftsmanship. The durability of the fabric and construction suggests longevity, making it a reliable choice for repeat wear.Appropriate for Weddings: The slim fit and formal design make this sport coat an excellent choice for wedding attire. It strikes the right balance between being fashionable and appropriate for a formal setting, ensuring you look sharp and put-together for the special occasion.Comfortable Fabric: The fabric used is comfortable and provides a good range of motion. It doesn't feel overly rigid, allowing for ease of movement during events like weddings where you might be on your feet for extended periods.Cons:Limited Color Options: The availability of limited color options may be a drawback for those looking for more variety. While the classic colors are versatile, a broader range could cater to a wider range of preferences and wedding themes.Sizing Consideration: It's essential to pay close attention to sizing when ordering. While the slim fit is stylish, it may not be suitable for everyone. Potential buyers should consider sizing up if they prefer a slightly looser fit.Conclusion:The Men's Sport Coats Blazers Slim Fit Jacket offers a contemporary and stylish option for those in need of formal attire, especially for weddings. The one-button design, quality construction, and versatile slim fit make it a commendable choice. With attention to sizing and a potentially expanded color range, this sport coat could easily elevate its appeal. Overall, it's a solid four-star recommendation for those seeking a modern and well-crafted addition to their formal wardrobe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well and looks good
reviews.reviewText: I got the medium size for my teenage son. He has a stocky build, 5’5”, 170 lbs and it fits him well. His arms are long so sometimes we run into the issue of sleeves being too short, but the sleeves on this are the perfect length for him. He said it is configurable to wear and move around in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice color. Ok starter dress coat for the teen. Material was a little different texture than I anticipated but worked for its purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pictures don’t do justice but this is a really nice jacket, it is perfect for casual wear or a night around town or date nights. It looks classy and stylish. I’m 5’5” and 170 pounds, dress shirt size 15 1/2 - 16, i ordered this in a Medium size and it fits perfectly. I like the overall feel of the fabric it is nice and comfortable to wear.
